item.title: R and Data Science activities in London, June 27th – 29th
item.description: Locke Data will be up to some shenanigans of various stripes in the big smoke. We hope to see you at some of them! June 26th — Monday Introduction to R (Newcastle) I won’t be in London for this but I’ll be doing a day of Introduction to R in Newcastle. This is supporting the local user groups and costs up to £90 for the whole day.Intro to R in Newcastle, June 26th
